lines.i: The section contains information on the newborn baby. Note, if there is a multiple delivery, there will be a separate report for each birth. The content is drawn from labor and delivery records, newborn's medical records, mother's medical records. The reader should note that the subject of this section - the newborn infant - is different from the overall subject of the clinical document - which is the mother.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.10"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="DOCSECT" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:51)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:53)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="57075-4" Newborn delivery information from newborn narrative (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:52)
A code value that indicates the nature of the section - it contains information on the newborn.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:54)
The text entry is drawn from the structured content contained within the entries of this section. Text is required to provide human readible content.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] subject (CONF:55)
This subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SBJ" (CONF:65)
This subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] relatedSubject (CONF:66)
This relatedSubject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PRS" (CONF:67)
This relatedSubject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] subject (CONF:68)
This subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PSN" (CONF:69)
This subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE" (CONF:70)
This subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] sDTCId (CONF:71)
An identifier assigned to the newborn. The medical record number assigned by the delivering institution should be provided.
This subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:72)
The name provided for the newborn.
This subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] administrativeGenderCode (CONF:73), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1 AdministrativeGenderCode) (CONF:74)
This subject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] birthTime (CONF:75)
The birth date and time of the newborn. By the same token, the date and time of delivery.
This relatedSubject SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="CHILD" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.111 RoleCode)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:56)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Plurality (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.41)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:57)
Record birth order if not a single delivery.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Birth Order (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.16)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:58)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Number of Infants Born Alive (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.37)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry (CONF:59)
One or more entries recording the presence of an abnormal condition may be recorded. Each entry contains information for a single condition.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Abnormal Condition of the Newborn (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.13)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry (CONF:60)
There may be multiple congenital anomalies recorded. At least one observation will be present in the case that none are present.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Congenital Anomaly (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.19)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entry (CONF:61)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Infant Transfer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.29)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:62)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Infant Living (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.28)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:63)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Infant Breastfed (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.27)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:64)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Newborns Vital Signs Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.11)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Assessments Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.9)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="DOCSECT" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:51)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:53)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="57075-4" Newborn delivery information from newborn narrative (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:52)
A code value that indicates the nature of the section - it contains information on the newborn.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:54)
The text entry is drawn from the structured content contained within the entries of this section. Text is required to provide human readible content.

Contains exactly one [1..1] Plurality (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.41)

Contains exactly one [1..1] Birth Order (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.16)
